DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess safety , tolerability pharmacokinetics AZD1446 young elderly healthy Japanese volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Assess Safety , Tolerability Pharmacokinetics Modified-Release Formulations AZD1446 After Oral Single Repeated Doses
DOC.criteria: Healthy Japanese volunteer , age ≥20 ≤50 year male young volunteer , ≥65 ≤80 year male postmenopausal female elderly volunteer . BMI 18 27 kg/m2 weigh least 50 kg 90 kg ( elderly female , weigh least 45 kg 90 kg ) . History severe allergy/hypersensitivity reaction include drugallergy drug hypersensitivity reaction , ongoing allergy/hypersensitivity . History present symptom sign Quincke oedema , angiooedema , urticaria pigmentosa , history repeat episode urticaria .
